description:
Staying true to their roots, these simple goggles use thermal lenses to give you clear view of what lies ahead. Whether you’re new to snowsports, only do it a couple times a year, or are looking to save money for lift tickets, the Electra goggles offer great protection at a great price.

  • Designed for medium faces
  • Airflow ventilation combined with a double paned lens helps keep fog at bay
  • Wide, silicone backed strap has a quick-fit adjustment system
  • Includes a microfiber goggle bag
name: Smith Electra Goggles - Unisex
